cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.result.render
Class JFreeChartRender

java.lang.Object
  cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.result.render.JFreeChartRender
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageListener
public class JFreeChartRender
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageListener

Listens to solver and draws graph with best solutions.

STYLE_THESIS

public static final int STYLE_THESIS
Chart style used in the thesis.

Uses:

  • setBaseShapesVisible(true)
  • setBaseShapesFilled(false)
  • setBaseLinesVisible(false)
  • setLegendItemFont(new Font("Dialog", Font.PLAIN, 9))
  • setBackgroundPaint(Color.white)
  • setGridPaint(Color.gray)
  • setInsertLast(false)
  • removeLegend()

See Also:
Constant Field Values

STYLE_THESIS_LEGEND

public static final int STYLE_THESIS_LEGEND
Chart style used in the thesis.

Uses:

  • setBaseShapesVisible(true)
  • setBaseShapesFilled(false)
  • setBaseLinesVisible(false)
  • setLegendItemFont(new Font("Dialog", Font.PLAIN, 9))
  • setBackgroundPaint(Color.white)
  • setGridPaint(Color.gray)
  • setInsertLast(false)
